DOC.brief_title: A Study Measuring Effects Intima Media Thickness : An Evaluation Rosuvastatin 40 mg ( METEOR )
DOC.criteria: Maximum IMT > 1.2 mm 3.5 mm location carotid ultrasound study conduct Visit 2 ( Week 4 ) Visit 3 ( Week 2 ) Subjects age risk factor : Fasting LDLC Visit 1 ( Week 6 ) > 120 mg/dL ( 3.1mmol/L ) < 190 mg/dL ( 4.9 mmol/L ) Subjects 2 risk factor 10year coronary heart disease ( CHD ) risk < 10 % : Fasting LDLC Visit 1 ( Week 6 ) > 120 mg/dL ( 3.1 mmol/L ) < 160 mg/dL ( 4.1 mmol/L ) Use pharmacologic lipidlowering medication ( eg , HMGCoA reductase inhibitor , fibrate derivative , bile acid binding resin , niacin analogue dose > 400 mg ) within 12 month prior Visit 1 ( Week 6 ) .
